Articles.Content:
Whenever I go to the launchpad on one particular craft, Kerbin becomes black and the speed goes to NaN. Kraken? (Picture of craft and Error):http://imgur.com/a/nEbP0

Error Log:http://speedy.sh/Yv8sj/2015-03-19-152452

Mod List (Yes you're thinking, Holy ___!)

http://imgur.com/a/xHHVV

Edited March 19, 2015 by crashy

It appears this only happens on Remote Tech with the CommTech-1 and the big dishes, like the AIES Comlar-1 and the Reflectetron GX-1. Every other craft works fine.

Using Remote Tech Version 1.6.3

Strange thing is that this thing has just started happening a few days ago on Wednesday, after installing CactEye 2 on Win-32 bit.

Edited March 20, 2015 by crashy
